class.name: PhysicsShapeRestInfoResult2D
class.brief_description: Stores the nearest collision information of a shape query.
class.description: This class contains the collision data computed by [method PhysicsDirectSpaceState2D.get_rest_info]. If the shape collides with multiple objects, only the nearest collision is stored.

members.member: The unique ID of the colliding shape.
The shape index of the colliding shape.
The linear velocity of the colliding object. If the object is an [Area2D], the result is [code]Vector2(0, 0)[/code].
The collision normal at the intersection point, pointing away from the colliding shape.
The collision point on the colliding shape.
